attributes.additional_details: I work in a nursery. I feel so unsafe going to work where it is impossible to do my job socially distant. If it is not safe for schools to be open where it is possible to be socially distant then it is most definitely not safe for early years workers.
attributes.background: Shut early years providers while schools are closed and only open for key workers

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566718
